extendedInfo.description: Become a safer driver and prepare for your theory test using your Android device!The Theory Test application by the BSM enables you to prepare for your theory test by allowing you to practice the official Driving Standards Agency (DSA) questions and even take a test which is designed to be just like the real test situation! This app is a taster for the full version for the car driving theory tests â yet still allows you access up to 70 of the official DSA questions!Features include âEasy to use interface with your progress displayed and test time left. If you stop the test you can continue where you left off ...or start a new test.Question bank - of 70 of the latest official DSA questions from the official test!Practice questions â Choose in increments of 10 the amount of questions youâd like to practice on, so if youâre in a hurry you can always do a few at a time before being ready to try test mode!An explanation of the answer is shown if you get the answer wrong.Scoring â At the end of each test you are given a percentage score and will know if itâs enough for you to pass or fail.Test Mode â Designed to mimic the actual  test conditions â 50 questions in 50 minutes! Timed so you know how long itâs taken to complete and scored so you know what your pass rate is!Your best and worst category is displayed at the end of the test so you know where to concentrate your revision learning on.Large Images â Making them easier to see on the Android screen!Settings â You can change whether you select 'next' or move to next question automatically.   - You can also change if you are alerted to the correct answer.At the end of all tests you can view all the questions you took, see which you got right and which you got wrong, and see an explanation for the correct answer.Itâs the very best way to prepare for your theory test!  - as recommended by 97% of Driving Instructors!*In the full version We don't just give you a sample of questions we give you the option to see ALL of the 900+ questions, by category. That way you will get to see the questions that you will get on your actual test!  Now that may sound like cheating but we want you to be safest driver you can be and learn as much as you can about driving safely and the Highway Code. So you can revise all questions â the entire official question bank of over 970 questions presented to you by category ...so no surprise questions!* Please see our website for details (http://www.abellearning.com)Crown copyright material reproduced under licence from the Driving Standards Agency which does not accept any responsibility for the accuracy of the reproduction

reviews.title: Rubbish
reviews.comment: It has ?s that dont even have the correct answer so you going to fail. IT IS A LOAD OF S*** do not download waste of time
reviews.author: Chris Huddlestone

reviews.title: Take it you WILL FAIL
reviews.comment: It thinks tge national speed limit sign means no entry but only gave you that and a no waiting sign to choose from in the first place. It had many other signs wrong. This is my first look at driving and I know more correct answers than the bsm app. Not impressed
reviews.author: Joseph Board

reviews.title: Rubbish
reviews.comment: It said that the national speed limit sign meant no motor vehicles. Complete rubbish. Some of the mulitiple choices didnt even appear. Dont trust!!
reviews.author: Darcy Pendrill-Adams

reviews.title: Poor quality
reviews.comment: Just like the AA app this has either missing images or it would say one off four and only display 2 answers.
